"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2012_Ticket"	"This item is an invitation to personally attend the Dota 2 International Tournament, August 31 - September 2 2012, in Seattle, WA. Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.<br><br>This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed no later than June 30th, 2012 to the email address associated with your Steam account.<br><br>This purchase also includes a tradable Dota 2 Invite that grants access to the game (PC only)."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Drum_of_Tales"	"Every generation has a seer to act as chronicler and teller of old tales.  As each one dies, a small handful of their bones are preserved and placed in the drum so that their spirit might infuse the telling of old tales.  Though the drum itself has been replaced many times, the oldest bones within are hundreds of years old."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Strange_Modifier_Axe_Culls"	"Strange Modifier: Enemies Culled"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_Culls"	"將此奇異精髓附魔於您所選擇的奇異物品將能夠在裝備時紀錄斧王利用淘汰之刃秒殺敵人的次數。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_Culls"	"Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of enemies you've Culled while wearing it as Axe."
"DOTA_Item_Strange_Modifier_Axe_BattleHungerKills"	"奇異精髓：戰鬥飢渴擊殺次數"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Strange_Modifier_Axe_BattleHungerKills"	"Strange Modifier: Battle Hunger Kills"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_BattleHungerKills"	"將此奇異精髓附魔於您所選擇的奇異物品將能夠在裝備時紀錄斧王利用戰鬥飢渴擊殺敵人的次數。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_BattleHungerKills"	"Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of enemies you've killed with Battle Hunger while wearing it as Axe."
"DOTA_Item_Strange_Modifier_Axe_LowHealthKills"	"奇異精髓：斧王瀕死擊殺次數"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Strange_Modifier_Axe_LowHealthKills"	"Strange Modifier: Axe Near Death Kills"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_LowHealthKills"	"將此奇異精髓附魔於您所選擇的奇異物品將能夠在裝備時紀錄斧王在低於自身血量 15 % 時利用淘汰之刃秒殺敵人的次數。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Axe_LowHealthKills"	"Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of enemies you've killed while having less than 15% of your health while wearing it as Axe."

"DOTA_Item_Bow_of_the_Howling_Wind"	"狂風倏忽之弓"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Bow_of_the_Howling_Wind"	"Bow of the Howling Wind"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Howling_Wind_Bow"	"在遙遠北方無盡的寒冷中，相傳死亡的寒意是由一頭巨大的白狼吹起的呼嘯狂風所帶來的。無數的獵人有意屠殺隻象徵著墳墓的靈獸。但是在所有可考的歷史中，記錄的只有一把射了無數支箭，命中無數敵人的神弓。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Howling_Wind_Bow"	"In the endless chill of the far north, it is said that the cold of death comes on a howling wind brought by a great white wolf.  Many a hunter has attempted to slay this grave spirit.  Yet in all the known histories, the stories record only one bow that has ever fired strong enough, and true enough, to pierce its side."

"DOTA_Item_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"多佛瑞特和羅西南特"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"Dolfrat and Roshinante"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"常常能聽到巫師多佛瑞特說出這樣的話：「我怎麼來到這兒的？」他的魔力太過強大，連他自己都不能掌控。這是真的，他的敵人都譴責他完全沒有身為一名法師應有的教養，最直接的證據是他的口頭禪「這是我幹的嗎？」如果你曾經看到多佛瑞特平躺在路上，那你就可以肯定他信賴的戰馬羅西南特就在附近某處——可能正以最快速度飛奔逃離一棵即將倒塌的樹或是有惡夢力量般的惡魔所散布的陰影。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"\"How did I get here?\" Such words of power are commonly heard from Dolfrat the Wizard, whose magic is so great that even he cannot grasp it. Indeed, his enemies accuse him of having no magical training whatsoever, pointing to the evidence of his most frequent incantation: \"Did I do that?\" And should you ever spy the mighty Dolfrat flat on his back in the road, you can be sure his trusty steed Roshinante is somewhere nearby--probably galloping at top speed away from a creaky tree or shadow that resembled a demon of nightmarish power."
"DOTA_Item_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"黃銅斑驢"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"Braze the Zonkey"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"在傳統的季節遷移時與他的族群走散了，而他現在透過異次元空間來到了這塊新的棲息地。不過這都沒關係。因為除了敵方英雄以外，他完全沒有天敵！"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"Separated from his herd when disruptions to the traditional migratory route took it through a tesseract, he stands out a bit in this new habitat. But that's all right. Apart from enemy heroes, he has no natural predators!"
"DOTA_Item_Pennant_DK"	"DK 旗幟"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Pennant_DK"	"DK Pennant"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_DK"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對 DK 的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在 2012 年國際錦標賽比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品，而之後 Valve 未來指定的其他比賽也可以用得上。DK 旗幟能夠與其他 DK 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_DK"	"Show your support for DK by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during the International 2012, and other tournaments Valve may designate in the future.  DK pennants can be combined with other DK pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"DOTA_Item_Pennant_mTw"	"mTw 旗幟"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Pennant_mTw"	"mTw Pennant"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_mTw"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對 mTw 的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在 2012 年國際錦標賽比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品，而之後 Valve 未來指定的其他比賽也可以用得上。mTw 旗幟能夠與其他 mTw 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_mTw"	"Show your support for mTw by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during the International 2012, and other tournaments Valve may designate in the future.  mTw pennants can be combined with other mTw pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."
"DOTA_Item_Pennant_EG"	"Evil Geniuses 旗幟"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Pennant_EG"	"Evil Geniuses Pennant"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_EG"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對 Evil Geniuses 的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在 Valve 所支援的比賽中觀賞您所支持的隊伍時能夠獲得掉落物品。EG 旗幟能夠與其他 EG 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_EG"	"Show your support for Evil Geniuses by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  EG pennants can be combined with other EG pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."
"DOTA_Item_International_Treasure_Key"	"國際錦標賽鑰匙"
"[english]DOTA_Item_International_Treasure_Key"	"International Key"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Treasure_Key"	"用來開啟<font color='#9da1a9'>冠軍的珍品寶藏</font>與<font color='#9da1a9'>挑戰者的勇氣寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。在 2012 年 9 月 3 日之後此鑰匙將會變回普通鑰匙。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Treasure_Key"	"Used to open both the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Champions</font> and the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Challengers</font>.
Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
After the end of September 3rd, 2012 this will become a normal key."

"DOTA_Item_Pennant_Mousesports"	"Mousesports 旗幟"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Pennant_Mousesports"	"Mousesports Pennant"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_Mousesports"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對 Mousesports 的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在 2012年國際錦標賽比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品，而之後 Valve 未來指定的其他比賽也可以用得上。Mousesports 旗幟能夠與其他 Mousesports 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_Mousesports"	"Show your support for Mousesports by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during the International 2012, and other tournaments Valve may designate in the future.  Mousesports pennants can be combined with other Mousesports pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"[english]DOTA_Item_The_Defense_3_ADMIN"	"The Defense 3 ADMIN"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3_ADMIN"	"The Defense，全球最大網路錦標賽之一，攜手新贊助 ROCCAT 和 own3D.tv 進入第 3 賽季。為期 3 個月的賽事中，24 支受邀職業隊伍和 8 支資格賽選拔隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 總獎金。門票包含Toby『Tobi Wan Kenobi』Dawson 實況解說的 The Defense 3 超過 100 場比賽，以及一隻獨家信使。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3_ADMIN"	"The Defense, one of the biggest online tournaments, is going into its third season with new sponsors ROCCAT and own3D.tv. Over the course of three months, 24 invited professional teams and eight teams from an open qualifier will battle for a prize pool of $20,000. The ticket for The Defense 3 will entitle you to over 100 broadcasted matches by Toby \"Tobi Wan Kenobi\" Dawson as well as one unique courier."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Pack"	"His old master said, \"Be clear what you are about, for these simple village folk read menace and evil intent into poor communication.\" Therefore Rhasta created a simple visual menu of the services he offers, and wears it in plain sight."

"DOTA_Item_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat"	"神秘浪子草帽"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat"	"Mysterious Vagabond's Hat"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat"	"「薩滿必須照顧好皮膚！」暗影薩滿的師傅曾教過。「因此，一定要常常戴著帽子別讓太陽照到，邪惡的月光也一樣。」然後老人總會朗聲大笑。「如果你相信我說的，我這有一包草藥，將賦予你無窮的財富和永生。」"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat"	"\"A shaman must take good care of his skin!\" Rhasta's master instructed. \"Therefore, always wear a hat to keep off the sun, and no less the evil influence of the moon.\" And then the old man always broke into laughter. \"And if you believe that, I have a bag of herbs here that will confer infinite wealth and immortality.\""
"DOTA_Item_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Concoction"	"神秘浪子的秘方"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Concoction"	"Mysterious Vagabond's Concoction"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Concoction"	"儘管有些旅行的薩滿被人控訴販賣能治百病的有色藥水，但暗影薩滿從未保證過，也沒有人因為從這瓶子中倒了一大杯，被收過這麼多錢。事實上，除了暗影薩滿以外沒人能喝裡面的藥水。暗影薩滿的藥水對釀造者以外的人都是必死無疑。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Concoction"	"Although some travelling shaman have been rightly accused of selling colored water as if it were a certain cure for all ills, Rhasta makes no such claims and has never charged so much as a pence for a swig from this bottle. In fact, no one but Rhasta may drink from it. The Shadow Shaman's brew is certain death to anyone but its maker."

Inspired by the great battles they bear witness to, a smeevil may become emboldened to press ever more exotic beasts to their cause."

Ticket information will be emailed no later than June 30th, 2013 to the email address associated with your Steam account.<br><br>This purchase also includes a International 2013 Interactive Compendium and Smeevil Courier."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對 Alliance 隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在 Valve 所支援的比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。Alliance 旗幟能夠與其他 Alliance 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance"	"Show your support for Team Alliance by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Team Alliance pennants can be combined with other Team Alliance pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida"	"在萊卡希達的綠蠅領地經過幾個世紀的繁衍生息，寄生在樹精的枝幹上，汲取這些上古生物的養料。在巢穴中有一隻蚜蟲，靈活的身手及好奇的天性使它格外與衆不同。一天夜裡，他離開了領地，前去追尋自己的命運，他堅信自己超凡的速度和無私的奉獻精神會讓他在戰場上大顯身手。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida"	"The greenfly colony of Lecaciida had lived and thrived for centuries, inhabiting the trunks of Treants and nourishing themselves on the sap of those ageless giants. Among the hive was a young greenfly named Alphid who had distinguished himself through his agility, swiftness, and curious nature. One night, he left the colony and set out to find his own destiny, convinced that his exceptional speed and dedication could be put to good use on the battlefield."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Alliance"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Alliance"	"Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_AL_Pennant"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AL_Pennant"	"Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_MUFC_Pennant"	"購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MUFC_Pennant"	"Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

<br><br>

Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>16%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>
	Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Favor"	"本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>的獲得速率將提高<font color='#9da1a9'> 80% </font>；此外其他玩家的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>獲得速度也將提高<font color='#9da1a9'> 16% </font>，效果可堆疊。
<br><br>
戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Favor"	"Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>80%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>16%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them."

<br><br>
戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。"

Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>400%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>80%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>

<br><br>
戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。"

Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>400%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>80%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Point_Booster"	"本物品使用後，單場次遊戲<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>的獲得速率將提高<font color='#9da1a9'> 50% </font>；此外其他玩家的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>獲得速度也將提高<font color='#9da1a9'> 5% </font>，效果可堆疊。
<br><br>
戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Point_Booster"	"Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>50%</font> for a single match. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>5%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>
	Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them."

Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>400%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>80%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>
	
	Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
	"
